name: DANGER: Signal Lost
description:
Part of an infiltration unit, you were sent to gather intelligence from an enemy's system. Unfortunately for you, your recall signal has been disconnected, making continuing the mission too dangerous. You must now instead find a relay within the system to restore your connection, and get retrieved safely.
You'll need to make your way through the system's defences by staying near your team's prior sent drones that give off a perception field, making you undetectable by the system's defences.

This game was made in 3 days as part of Tig's Game Jam 3.

CREDITS

  • Sound Design - Daniel A
  • Game Design - Lachlan B, Alonso Z
  • Programming - Zayben C
